title: Classic V-Neck Knit Top
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a women's classic V-neck knit top, short sleeves, slim fit silhouette, solid dusty rose color, fine cotton jersey fabric, visible stitching and clean hems, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture
techpack: Single jersey knit cotton with 5% elastane for stretch, V-neckline finished with self-fabric binding, short sleeves with double-needle hem, hip length body, slim fit pattern block, all seams overlocked for durability.
provenance: Inspired by commercial V-neck trend in women's casual tops, adapted for everyday wear with comfortable stretch fabric.
design_text:
